snippet: Amid all their early season problems, it was easy to overlook the impact of Amar'e Stoudemire's injuries.
abstract: Amid all their early season problems, it was easy to overlook the impact of Amar'e Stoudemire's injuries.
lead_paragraph: BOSTON - Amid the Knicks' vast catalog of early-season woes - of shooting slumps and sprained joints, a weak bench, a nonexistent point guard and Carmelo Anthony's shot selection - Amar'e Stoudemire's lingering health concerns went almost unnoticed, and practically forgotten.

headline.main: Stoudemire's Surge Reminds Knicks of What They Were Missing
